title: Veysian District
text:
Veysian District () is a district (<a href="bakhsh">bakhsh</a>) in <a href="Dowreh%20County">Dowreh County</a>, <a href="Lorestan%20Province">Lorestan Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 13,029, in 3,065 families. The District has one city: <a href="Veysian">Veysian</a>. The District contains two <a href="Rural%20Districts%20of%20Iran">rural districts</a>: <a href="Shurab%20Rural%20District%20%28Lorestan%20Province%29">Shurab Rural District</a> and <a href="Veysian%20Rural%20District">Veysian Rural District</a>.
Economy.
Outside the town of <a href="Veysian">Veysian</a>, the district is primarily agricultural. It is famous for its rice farms, and its farms also produce vegetables.
